lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Michael Matosic/Richard Boardman/Peter Rycroft/Pablo Bowman
[00:01.000] 作曲 : 王嘉尔/Michael Matosic/Richard Boardman/Peter Rycroft/Pablo Bowman
[00:02.000] 制作人Produced by: Lostboy, The Six 
[00:03.000] 出版Published by: Warner Chappell (ASCAP), Warner Chappell Music (ASCAP), Kobalt Music Publishing (ASCAP), Matosic Music- C/O SONGS OF KOBALT MUSIC PUBLISHING (BMI) 
[00:04.000] 录音Recorded by: Isaac Han
[00:05.000] 录音室Recorded at: 8PEX (Seoul, South Korea)
[00:06.000]  混音Mixed by: Lostboy
[00:07.000]  混音室Mixed at: Neverland (London, UK)
[00:08.000] 母带Mastering Engineer Name: Mike Bozzi
[00:09.000] 母带室Mastering Studio : Bernie Grundman Mastering
[00:10.000] 发行公司：RYCE MUSIC GROUP 白米范（北京）文化传播有限公司
[00:11.000] 出品：TEAM WANG RECORDS 
[00:14.426]You don’t call me baby
[00:16.698]You call me my name
[00:21.281]But I keep on hoping
[00:23.131]Nothing has changed
[00:28.257]We keep on touching
[00:31.266]But we don’t feel
[00:34.749]Feels like you’re letting
[00:36.583]Your hands off the wheel
[00:41.633]What if I just hold on for a while
[00:45.298]Baby there’s no drug quite like denial
[00:48.679]Ooh my, If this is goodbye
[00:54.315]Don’t leave me loving you
[00:57.149]Whatever you do
[01:00.414]Don’t leave me loving you
[01:03.078]If you tip toe out in the morning
[01:05.549]I need a warning
[01:07.162]If you don’t feel it too
[01:10.415]But whatever you do
[01:13.465]Don’t leave me loving you
[01:16.665]If you’re out of this when I’m all in
[01:19.197]I need a warning
[01:20.965]Don’t leave me loving you babe
[01:24.599]Whatever you do babe
[01:28.114]Don’t leave me loving you babe
[01:32.331]Ooh babe
[01:36.929]The sun is setting
[01:39.727]In purple and blue
[01:42.998]Is there no getting
[01:45.447]Closer to you
[01:50.099]Waking up strangers
[01:52.998]California King
[01:56.563]Reaching out for you
[01:58.796]To bring you to me
[02:04.049]What if I just hold on for a while
[02:07.638]Baby there’s no drug quite like denial
[02:10.921]Ooh my, If this is goodbye
[02:16.205]Don’t leave me loving you
[02:19.518]Whatever you do
[02:22.633]Don’t leave me loving you
[02:25.153]If you tip toe out in the morning
[02:27.768]I need a warning
[02:30.357]If you don’t feel it too
[02:32.623]But whatever you do
[02:36.388]Don’t leave me loving you
[02:38.837]If you’re out of this when I’m all in
[02:41.854]I need a warning
[02:43.271]Don’t leave me loving you babe
[02:47.672]Whatever you do babe
[02:50.354]Don’t leave me loving you babe
[02:54.389]Ooh babe
[02:57.083]Don’t leave me loving you
[03:01.418]Whatever you do
[03:04.020]Don’t leave me loving you
[03:09.215]Ooh babe
[03:10.753]Don’t leave me loving you
[03:14.274]Whatever you do
[03:17.741]Don’t leave me loving you
[03:19.494]If you tip toe out in the morning
[03:22.679]I need a warning
[03:25.025]Don’t leave me loving you
tlyric:
[by:维尔日记]
[00:14.426]你不曾以亲爱的 将我称唤
[00:16.698]而是直呼我姓名
[00:21.281]可我仍期许你能改口
[00:23.131]结局也未改变
[00:28.257]持久的触碰
[00:31.266]也无法令情愫渗透
[00:34.749]犹如你早已将手松开
[00:36.583]你我牵连的方向盘
[00:41.633]若我执意如此 故事能否有转机
[00:45.298]从未料想 我竟会这般留恋
[00:48.679]亲爱的 倘若你我再无瓜葛
[00:54.315]我也不愿再 对你那般眷恋
[00:57.149]也请你 无论如何
[01:00.414]都别再让我 如此痴心于你
[01:03.078]若是想在清晨 蹑手蹑脚离去
[01:05.549]也请给我些许暗示吧
[01:07.162]如果你也不知 如何是好
[01:10.415]但也请你 无论如何
[01:13.465]都别再让我 如此痴心于你
[01:16.665]若是在我倾尽全心时 你想全身而退
[01:19.197]也请给些我预兆吧
[01:20.965]我也不会再 对你那般眷恋
[01:24.599]也请你 无论如何
[01:28.114]都别再让我 如此痴心于你
[01:32.331]亲爱的
[01:36.929]夕阳西下
[01:39.727]渲染出蓝紫色的天
[01:42.998]我是否已无法
[01:45.447]继续向你靠近
[01:50.099]躺在加州大床上
[01:52.998]苏醒已是陌路人
[01:56.563]只为将你触及
[01:58.796]并带到我身边
[02:04.049]若我执意如此 故事能否有转机
[02:07.638]从未料想 我竟会这般留恋
[02:10.921]亲爱的 倘若你我再无瓜葛
[02:16.205]我也不愿再 对你那般眷恋
[02:19.518]也请你 无论如何
[02:22.633]都别再让我 如此痴心于你
[02:25.153]若是想在清晨 蹑手蹑脚离去
[02:27.768]也请给我些许暗示吧

[02:36.388]都别再让我 如此痴心于你
